name: Strategic Consultant
description: External advisor helping clients with GTM strategy and operations

role.title: GTM Consultant / Revenue Consultant / Fractional CRO
role.decision_authority: Strong influence on client tool decisions, implements for multiple orgs

pains: Client conversations contain gold but extracting insights takes hours
Billable time wasted on admin instead of strategy
Clients expect AI insights but current tools are legacy
Knowledge lives in my head and can't be shared
success_criteria: Stay ahead of competitors with modern tools
Build repeatable frameworks from client patterns
evaluation_heuristics: Can I use this across multiple clients?
Does this enhance my expertise or commoditize it?
Will clients pay more because I use this?
Is the output quality high enough for C-suite?
fears: AI diluting the quality clients pay premium for
Getting caught using unapproved tools with client data
AI missing nuance that costs the engagement
Recommendations I can't defend to C-suite
